title: Three Designs for Silver Cigarette Lighters
medium: Brush and black ink, graphite on paper board
description: Design for cigarette lighter with decorative band of cross-hatching below rim and on base above attached plate; ashtray in form of cup in round dish with flaring sides; "ASR" [client's initials?] faintly in graphite in banderole top center; decorative band of cross hatching below rim of lighter and at lighter base above attached plate.
name: Drawing
